pkgmetadata.longdescription: Assessing Heterogeneity in Surrogacy Using Censored Data // Provides functions to assess and test for heterogeneity in the utility of a surrogate marker with respect to a baseline covariate using censored (survival data), and to test for heterogeneity across multiple time points. More details are available in Parast et al (2024) doi:10.1002/sim.10122.
